title: 电脑开的minecraftpe服指令大全
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1599236877 于 2015-7-26 21:10 编辑 

指令列表：（下面有汉化）
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: --- Showing help page 1 of 1 (/help <page>) ---
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /ban: Prevents the specified player from using this server
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /ban-ip: Prevents the specified IP address from using this server
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /banlist: View all players banned from this server
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /defaultgamemode: Set the default gamemode
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /deop: Takes the specified player's operator status
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /difficulty: Sets the game difficulty
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /effect: Adds/Removes effects on players
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /gamemode: Changes the player to a specific game mode
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /give: Gives the specified player a certain amount of items
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /help: Shows the help menu
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /kick: Removes the specified player from the server
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /kill: Commit suicide or kill other players
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /list: Lists all online players
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /me: Performs the specified action in chat
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /op: Gives the specified player operator status
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /pardon: Allows the specified player to use this server
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /pardon-ip: Allows the specified IP address to use this server
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /particle: Adds particles to a world
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /plugins: Gets a list of plugins running on the server
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /reload: Reloads the server configuration and plugins
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /save-all: Saves the server to disk
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /save-off: Disables server autosaving
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /save-on: Enables server autosaving
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /say: Broadcasts the given message as the sender
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /seed: Shows the world seed
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /setworldspawn: Sets a worlds's spawn point. If no coordinates are specified, the player's coordinates will be used.
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /spawnpoint: Sets a player's spawn point
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /stop: Stops the server
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /tell: Sends a private message to the given player
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /time: Changes the time on each world
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /timings: Records timings to see performance of the server.
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /tp: Teleports the given player (or yourself) to another player or coordinates
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /version: Gets the version of this server including any plugins in use
[16:39:58] [Server thread/INFO]: /whitelist: Manages the list of players allowed to use this server

【翻译后】（未知的不写了，只写已知的）
1、/ban ： 将一个玩家ban掉
2、/ban-ip :将一个IP地址黑掉
3、/banlist：创建一个黑名单
4、/defautgamemode：更改默认游戏模式
5、/deop ：去除一个玩家的OP权限
6、/difficulty：更改游戏难度
7、/gamemode：临时更改当前游戏模式
8、/give：给玩家物品/方块（示例：/give Steve torch 64，给Steve64个火把，若是所有玩家则是@e）
9、/help：打开帮助菜单
10、/kill：杀s谁（示例：/kill Steve，或者/kill @e ）
11、/op：给一个玩家op权限。
12、/saves-all：保存存档
13、/saves-on：开启自动保存
14、/say：全服广播（示例： /say OP来也！， 客户端显示：<Server>OP来也！）
15、/seed：显示当前服务器种子
16、/stop：停止服务器，不解释
17、/tell：私聊一个玩家（示例：/tell Alex Hello! ， Alex那里显示：<Server>Hello!）
18、/time：设定时间（示例：/time set 0为清晨，/time set 1800为中午等）
19、/tp：传送不解释，（示例：/tp Steve，传送到Steve身边）
注释：@e代表所有实体，@player是玩家名。输入命令时不带斜杠！例如time set 0和kill Steve 
如果还有的，可以补充！
